verses.roman:
tabe raghunātha kari' aneka yatana
māse dui-dina kailā prabhura nimantraṇa

synonyms: tabe—at that time; raghunātha—Raghunātha dāsa; kari' aneka yatana—with great attention; māse—every month; dui-dina—two days; kailā—he made; prabhura nimantraṇa—invitation to Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: At that time, Raghunātha dāsa invited Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to his house with great attention for two days every month.
